meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut.
meanings.sent1: Eating probiotic yogurt helps the good bacteria in your stomach.
meanings.sent2: I take a probiotic every morning to keep my digestive system healthy.
meanings.sent3: The probiotic party in my belly is making all the good bacteria dance!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a probiotic for the gloomy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The probiotic potion worked its magic on the tiny organisms in his gut.

meanings.definition: A type of food or supplement containing live bacteria that are beneficial to health.
meanings.sent1: My doctor recommended a probiotic to improve my digestion.
meanings.sent2: Probiotic drinks are becoming popular for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The probiotic smoothie was like a tasty treat for my gut bugs.
meanings.sent4: Her positive energy was a probiotic for the team's morale.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the probiotic capsules working wonders inside me after a few days.
